contest-event.event-date:
May 18, 1996 D SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section)
SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest (First Section) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest SEWBBA (Ebbw Vale) Contest ebbw-vale-contest-first-section
Test Piece Contest
Connotations
Ebbw Vale Leisure Centre, Ebbw Vale, Blaenau Gwent, Wales, UK Best instrumentalist - euphonium Lewis Merthyr. Prizes - 1st £100, 2nd £60, 3rd £40. 7 bands competed.
Feb. 28, 2013, 9:17 a.m. July 1, 2020, 7:59 a.m.
1 Lewis Merthyr Band Colin Toghill
2 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Alan Gibbs
3 Tylorstown Band Ceri Thomas
4 Abergavenny Borough Band Eric Powell
5 TATA Brass E. J. Clark
6 Rogerstone Band Laurence Harries
7 Ammanford Silver Band Gerald Roberts
